Tip: Bypass IP whitelist restrictions using reverse proxy (proxy_pass).
Tip: The userid of the user who receives the message, up to 20 at a time (separated by \'|\')
Tip: Dynamically specified, supports up to two channels, separated by a vertical bar |
Opt., e.g. to send service number and enterprise WeChat application, then fill in 9|66
Tip: Only test accounts and Wework application message channels are supported
Opt., multiple openids are separated by commas

Main switch, requires permissions to read and sned SMS messages, especially verification SMS texts.

Priority: custom template for forwarding rules > Global custom template > System default
Please lock it first and then enable to hide
Tip: Insert labels as needed; Leave blank to apply default template
Set it to manual management, including automatic startup, associated startup, and background running
Your phone does not support this setting
Can not directly operate the system power saving optimization Settings

Example of multiple matching rules: (see wiki for syntax)

AND IS PHONE_NUM EQUALS 10086
[space]OR IS PHONE_NUM EQUALS 10011
AND IS MSG_CONTENT CONTAIN arrears

The above rule means: receive a text message, and (the mobile phone number is 10086 or the mobile phone number is 10010), and the content of the text message includes arrears When forwarding the text message

Note: The space at the beginning of each line represents the level, too complex multiple rules may lead to a large memory usage!

Example of multiple matching rules: (see wiki for syntax)

AND IS PHONE_NUM EQUALS 10086
[space]OR IS PHONE_NUM EQUALS 10011
AND IS CALL_TYPE IS 3

The above rule means: receive a call, and (the mobile phone number is 10086 or 10010), and the call type is Missed When forwarding the call

Note: The space at the beginning of each line represents the level, too complex multiple rules may lead to a large memory usage!

Call types: 1.Incoming Ended 2.Outgoing Ended 3.Missed 4.Incoming Received 5.Incoming Answered 6.Outgoing Started

Example of multiple matching rules: (see wiki for syntax)

AND IS PACKAGE_NAME EQUALS com.tencent.mm
[space]OR IS PACKAGE_NAME EQUALS com.tencent.mobileqq
AND IS INFORM_CONTENT CONTAIN arrears

The above rules mean: Receive an APP notification, and (the APP package name is com.tencent.mm or the APP package name is com.tencent.mobileqq), and the content of the notification includes forwarding the notification when the payment is in arrears

Note: The space at the beginning of each line represents the level, too complex multiple rules may lead to a large memory usage!

Important Note:
This feature is intended solely for personal use in switching between old and new phones. Any consequences arising from illegal use are the user's responsibility!

Instructions:
1. Connect both old and new phones to the same WiFi network (disable AP isolation). If internal network penetration is needed, configure Frpc first.
2. [Choose One] On the old phone, tap the "Push" button to send this device's configuration to the server.
3. [Choose One] On the new phone, tap the "Pull" button to fetch the server's configuration to this device.

Notes:
1. The client and server app versions must match for successful cloning.
2. Upon successful import, the senders and forwarding rules will be entirely replaced, clearing the historical records.
3. Active requests, keep-alive measures, and personal settings are not included in the cloning scope.
4. After successful import, it's crucial to re-enter the [General Settings] and toggle on the functions you need! (Or manually grant permissions in system settings).

Important Note:
This feature is strictly intended for personal use in switching between old and new phones. Any consequences arising from illegal use are the user's responsibility!

Notes:
1. The exporting and importing apps must have identical versions for one-click cloning to work!
2. Upon successful import on the new phone, the senders and forwarding rules will be entirely replaced, clearing the history records!
3. Active requests, keep-alive measures, and personal settings are not included in the cloning process.
4. After a successful import, it's crucial to re-enter the [General Settings] and toggle on the functions you need! (Or manually grant permissions in system settings).

For example: payload=%7B%22text%22%3A%22[msg]%22%7D [msg] will be replaced with SMS content.\nJson format is supported, e.g. {\"text\":\"[msg]\"}.\nNote: msg is automatically URLEncoder except in JSON format
Secret: If left empty, the sign will not be calculated
Successful Response Keyword：If left empty, HTTP status 200 represents success
Successful Response Keyword：Leaving it blank means sending is considered as successful.

Unknown brand: You need to check the settings yourself
Huawei: Application startup management -> turn off the application switch -> turn on allow self-starting
Honor: Application startup management -> turn off the application switch -> turn on allow self-starting
XiaoMi: Authorization Management -> Self-Start Management -> Allow Apps to Self-Start
OPPO: Permissions Privacy -> Self-Start Management -> Allow Apps to Self-Start
VIVO: Permission Management -> Self-Start -> Allow Apps to Self-Start
MeiZu: Permission Management -> Background Management -> Click Apply -> Allow Background Running
SamSung: Autorun apps -> turn on app switch -> battery management -> unmonitored apps -> add apps
LeTv: Self-starting management -> Allow applications to self-start
Smartisan: Permission management -> Self-starting permission management -> Click Apply -> Allow to be activated by the system
The APP needs to be restarted for this configuration item to take effect

Minimize time tolerance to avoid request replay attacks
Private key is used on the server: the private key of the server response message is encrypted, and the client public key is decrypted
Public key is used on the client: client request message public key encryption, server private key decryption
Client or server interaction messages are all encrypted and decrypted using SM4
